name: Optimize Team Assignments
description:
Globally optimize task assignments across an entire team or project board. Uses intelligent algorithms to balance workload, minimize completion time, or maximize quality based on chosen strategy.

** WHEN TO USE **
- When planning sprint assignments for multiple tasks
- To rebalance team workload
- To optimize for fastest delivery or highest quality
- When onboarding new tasks to a board

** OPTIMIZATION STRATEGIES **
- load_balance: Distribute work evenly across team (default)
- minimize_time: Assign to fastest performers to complete ASAP
- maximize_quality: Assign to best-matched experts for highest quality

** HOW IT WORKS **
- Analyzes all tasks in the queue
- Considers current team capacity and assignments
- Applies global optimization (not greedy per-task)
- Respects capacity limits and dependencies
- Returns optimal assignment plan

** RETURNS **
- Optimized assignment map (task -> assignee)
- Load distribution after optimization
- Estimated total completion time
- Quality predictions
- Recommendations for improvements

** EXAMPLE **
{
  "boardId": "sprint-23",
  "strategy": "load_balance",
  "constraints": {
    "respectCurrentAssignments": true,
    "maxReassignments": 5
  }
}

Returns: Balanced assignments with Sarah: 3 tasks (45%), Mike: 2 tasks (60%), Emma: 3 tasks (40%)

maxReassignments.description: Maximum number of tasks to reassign
